website_summaries.verdict: This service dog vest provides a comfortable fit for larger dogs. Matching leash is a great option to clearly identify the pet as a service dog.
pros: Simple buckle design for taking vest off and on
Pet owners appreciate the high quality materials used in the vest
cons: Works with a backpack, but it must be purchased separately
Owners say sizes run too large for small dogs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome harness & leash for service dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this harness & leash for my allergy alert service dog. It’s made of good quality materials and both the harness & handle of the leash are nicely padded. It’s obvious my Beagle is quite comfortable in it. She takes her job very seriously and was proudly strutting her stuff in this harness. I love that it’s pink too! It’s very quick & easy to get on & off. Sizing chart is accurate. I’m going to order one for my mom’s diabetic service dog as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to make some adjustments. ...buckle too big and bulky for the dog
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Holmes

customer_reviews.title: The vest fits perfect and appears to be well made and the leash ...
customer_reviews.text: I measured my dog and ordered the size that fit my measurements. The vest fits perfect and appears to be well made and the leash looks great. I would buy one again for sure. Please keep in mind that this vest is only good for a certified service dog. There is a metal ring on this vest that you attach the leash to. If your dog isn't a true service dog and wants to run at another dog then the vest won't be as reliable as having the leash attached to the collar and you will be facing charges. Don't order this vest unless your dog is trained very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It seems comfortable enough for her as well and easy to put ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the xss and this fit my 6 lbs Yorkipoo perfectly! It seems comfortable enough for her as well and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great vest. I actually got it because of its ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vest. I actually got it because of its good reviews. It slides on and off easily. I don't even bother with the velcro. The clip works great and it's padded for his comfort. It's smaller than our previous harness and that is really good for hot days. My pup is black and white so I think the color compliments him. The only warning I have is if your dog sheds a lot the fur does get stuck in the velcro so to keep up appearances I have to pick it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Great but may need altering
customer_reviews.text: The strap that goes around the chest was a little big even though everything else fit perfectly so all we did was cut some of the Velcro strap off, burned the end with a lighter and now it fits like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Allie B.

customer_reviews.title: What Does a Beautiful Service Dog Wear Every Day?
customer_reviews.text: Love this, and our Husky lives it, too. Looks very 'professional', is easy to get on and off with excellent and secure velcro fastening. Like the bright pink color-our Husky is pure ivory with blue eyes, and we chose it for the complimentary color, ease of getting on and off, and durability. Made of rip-stop fuschia nylon. Couldn't be happier. Now just hope it lasts for some time. Will update, soon.
customer_reviews.author: Golden

customer_reviews.title: Strong, fits well & adjustable, and colors are bright and reflective
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my Italian Greyhound and they are usually very hard to find something that fits because of their deep chests. He doesn't mind wearing it, he definitely knows as soon as the vest goes on, he is working. Its bright, the service dog patches are on velcro & I wasn't sure how they would hold up long term, but they haven't even moved. The service dog patches are easy for people to see and it usually keeps most people from trying to engage him. *posted a photo with out the vest to show how deep his chest is*
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and buy this since its the best
customer_reviews.text: These are seriously the BEST vests out there. They are very well made. Cushioned just enough for them.. they don't fall apart! I'd say they run a bit big.. now the chest strap will always be to but they made it that way so you can cut it to fit your dog perfectly. We breed English and French Bulldogs and train for service dogs as well and I wouldn't use any other vest!
customer_reviews.author: Top Gun Exotic Bulldogs

customer_reviews.title: The perfect vest!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this red service dog vest for my Havanese, who is on the larger side of "small dog". It was perfectly adjustable and fit like a glove. She did not seem to be bothered by the garment at all, and she could lay comfortably while wearing it. It will undoubtedly make her look "more official" looking when we are out! I also like the reflective letters and chest piece. The leash is sturdy and also has the reflective letters. Thanks for the quality item!
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: Vest looks great and seems pretty tough. Just as described. Though I did not recieved the matching leash, this company followed up and is semding one out to me. Will definitely be doing business with thrm again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Robin W.

customer_reviews.title: Right the First Time!
customer_reviews.text: I could kick myself! If I had a dollar for every wrong leash and harness I’ve purchased for my dog...Learn from this review and do it once and be glad you did. This is the best leash and harness. There’s plenty room to grow into it. No pinching clasps or velcro sticking to my dogs ears, hair, etc. simply love the detail! Stitching doesn’t come undone looking like I made it myself. Leash has more than enough length to where I’m not crawling on the ground with my dog. I’m not kidding...Some of the other vendors products are a HOT mess! Give me a hug, I finally got it right...
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for service animal
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and durable. A little difficult to get on and off because it doesnt have alot of give. Dog is very comfortable in it. Excellent asset when our service dog accompanies us. Easily identifies animal so we are not made to feel uncomfortable (most of the time-it depends on the establishment-many are not family with state and federal laws so I carry a copy so they can read through ALL of them)
customer_reviews.author: DnD

customer_reviews.title: A big NO!
customer_reviews.text: First off it got lost, then came in mail super super late after that. Finally get it and it’s very cheaply made. The front part were Velcro is, is weird how it curves/bends on one side. I can’t add pictures for some reason to show what I’m talking about? but it’s just not made well doesn’t seem comfortable to my dog just crap! Don’t waste your time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Missy!

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the money especially
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and quality leash, high visibility reflection and vest. I have not had any issues with my dog and his certification when he's wearing these items. The neoprene on the leash is a nice touch. You can feel the quality, especially for the price! I will order replacement leashes from this seller. Much better quality than a friend bought from another vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Getsit

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like these and they are a easy harness to put on your dog. Be sure to order the right size and you will get a excellent fit. The leash doesn't have the best latch for a service dog but it's usable and a bit wider than you might expect. I liked that the label is Velcro so if we are not always in working mode it can be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I measured my dog before ordering and fortunately the size guide is correct as the harness fits perfectly. I ordered some Velcro tags that say "In Training" and it was so easy to Velcro them into place. The leash that came with this purchase is really nice. The hand loop is padded and very nice. I am happy with my purchase. Miley is too.
customer_reviews.author: walkworthy

customer_reviews.title: This was a perfect fit for my Chihuahua/Corgi Mix
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit for my Chihuahua/Corgi Mix. She is XXS 5lbs but it fits perfectly. The product has a soft, thick leash handle and harness so no rub Burns for either us. I didn't like that the Velcro folds under rather than over for easier adjusting. I may buy them in other colors. The quality was great. Also the shipping was fast! That's always nice. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID BOOTH

customer_reviews.title: If your dog pulls it will break
customer_reviews.text: My dog and I love this vest. It fits her well and is used to ducking her head through the chest area to put it on. Only issue is the “D” ring is weak and bent so it slipped out of the harness loop and boom! She’s off running away. Would work great if your dogs not a puller. .. as of now we have her leash wrapped around the harness handle. Kinda sux.
customer_reviews.author: Jharvey85

customer_reviews.title: Too much for a small dog
customer_reviews.text: Wish I liked it better. The design is great and love the color but it is built for a large dog. The fasteners and rings are big and heavy duty. The leash is also heavy. I wish they would take into consideration the size of dog it is going on.
customer_reviews.author: Marie A

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely high quality item and the Large size works ok (adjusted to the smallest position, with plenty of room to grow) for my 40 lbs shepherd puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Looks Great On My Dog
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. The quality is far more than I had hoped for. Both the harness and the leash are well made, quality materials and fit my dog perfectly. The leash is probably the best I have had for Georgie, it is wide, should last a lifetime and clarly shows he is a service animal.
customer_reviews.author: Lenrapp

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Just received. Fits perfect! Time will tell how sturdy it is. Kashi weighs about 50 lbs. So i got him a large. I did see other reviewers mention that it was missing the leash but mine came with it although not sure if we'll use it as I already have one.
customer_reviews.author: bboppblue

customer_reviews.title: A must for traveling service dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I love this harness and so does my service dog...it means we are on the go and he is included. Its large clear lettering gives a signal to others that he is a service dog and should not be petted without permission. And I was able to pick him up from the floor in a cramped airline seat by it. (Note: my dog weighs only 14 pounds.)
customer_reviews.author: L Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: Much to heavy for a small dog
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be made well and very sturdy. But it is much to heavy and bulky for anything but a large dog. And the leash is only available in a heavy 1" width. Unfortunately I had to return it because I have a smaller dog.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING HARNESS FOR LARGE SERVICE DOG
customer_reviews.text: Second one we've purchased. This is an outstanding design, has good night reflectivity, is solid, sturdy and works great. The reason for the second purchase is my daughter's service dog outgrew his first one.
customer_reviews.author: CLFDPOPS1

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get on and off. Sturdy and well made. I have 2. My dog is a combo servive dog and therapy dog so red says therapy, when we visit nursing homes and the other in pink is service dog use for me. When I went to training, the trainer loved it too.
customer_reviews.author: Willie M. Milazzo

customer_reviews.title: Got this Service Dog Harness for my brother as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this Service Dog Harness for my brother as a birthday gift ? He need a harness for he and his wife are going on a trip. I hope he likes it!Just got some fed back from my brother he was very pleased with this Service Dog Harness X Large I got for his dog .It fit his lab perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Guagliano

customer_reviews.title: Arrived fast but there’s no pockets
customer_reviews.text: Package was delivered fast! The only thing I don’t like is there are no pockets to keep cards or info about the dog. There is no room to add patches either but I should’ve read it better! All in all it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Angie West

customer_reviews.title: Sizing a bit off
customer_reviews.text: My pom could have used an XXS rather than an XS. I did follow your measuring chart. So, a bit hard to get the straps small enough, and if I try to pick her up with the handle the vest slides off over her head. Nice construction. Big 'service dog' patches helpful when you've got a small, non-traditional service dog. And the hot pink could have been a bit brighter. Overall, a good piece.
customer_reviews.author: deborah rubin

customer_reviews.title: The FIRST one that works correctly!
customer_reviews.text: I've been thru so many vests and harnesses and this is the FIRST one that actually works and fits well. I've ordered a total of three from this seller and I've not been disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ballard

customer_reviews.title: I love this. It is high quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It is high quality. My dog is comfortable in it. The only thing I am concerned is washing it. I don't want to ruin it in the wash. My dog is a male, when he urinates he lifts his leg, & some pee got on the bottom buckle area(the part that goes under the dog) I have a 14 lb Pomeranian papillon mix, maybe I ordered the vest 1 size to big, o well I still love this vest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good harness.
customer_reviews.text: Mack uses/wears this daily. Mack has to wear a fleece under it--like a horse blanket under a saddle--because it rubs at his upper neck/shoulder area. Mack does not have a thick coat or much body fat. I think if he were a lab or some other kind of dog this wouldn't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sb33162

customer_reviews.title: Leash & service dog patches are missing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the small red vest. However, all I got was the red vest. The LEASH and reflective patches ARE MISSING from the package. Please send me the missing pieces.Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Prime_Shopper_2017

customer_reviews.title: Fits Pomeranians
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 pound pomeranian fits her well. Keep in mind it has thick straps so her legs do hit the front when she walks. Does not come with a leash which is a little frustrating. Overall fits my needs
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great service dog harness
customer_reviews.text: As dog trainers we need a product that we can rely on. This one is great, adjusts easily and even comes with a leash. The handle has a padding and is comfortable on the hand.
customer_reviews.author: christina wise

customer_reviews.title: Measure your pup so you can get the right size and you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Love this harness and leash combo. Theyre padded well and it fits my boston well since i can make the neck bigger and chest smaller. I like the removable patches for personalized patches.
customer_reviews.author: britney sharpe

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Quality
customer_reviews.text: This vest is very well designed. It is great quality, sturdy, & overall just great. The padding is nice & thick but not too hot for the pup. I bought a small for my Boston Terrier (who usually a medium in harnesses). I used the measurement guide. Her girth was 21" but i thought an XS would be too small. The small fits her perfectly. The leash that comes with it is good quality too & the "Service Dog" writing on it does not seem like it will come off. The vest came with patches that said "Service Dog" but i bought the "Service Dog in Training" patches separately - as shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Neva R.

customer_reviews.title: I like it!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits large, the front reflective stripe has to be tucked under the side of the vest, otherwise it's too long and flops around. I love the color, even though the leash color doesn't EXACTLY match the vest color. All in all, I like it, not too big or heavy for y service dog. Shipped fast, thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Moriah Sheats

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how this settles a rambunctious dog down. The harness is a bit big but she is still a growing pup and I'm certain she will grow into it. Construction is excellent. and the material seems to be high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Garry Deal

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product. Followed fitting instructions, and harness fit my dog perfectly even though I would have never purchased an "extra small" for my medium size fur buddy. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: GRETA G ELLIOTT

customer_reviews.title: Loved the sturdiness, comfort and color!
customer_reviews.text: This harness is perfect for my Australian Shepherd. She loves it and it fits perfectly. The pink color is beautiful with her black coat. A year later and it's still in perfect shape!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Live the pink!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. I chose pink because we have 2 service dogs so my husband’s male service dog can wear the traditional red vest, and my female seizure dog can wear the pink vest.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyzombieslayer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. People still call my girl a boy though. Even with her hot pink service vest. Lol I want replacement badges for the vest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to fit to my small dog
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and easy to fit to my small dog. The lease seems to be for a large dog so I won't be using it. Other than that minor items I would recommend this to anyone with a small service dog.
customer_reviews.author: Neo

customer_reviews.title: Professional looking.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I saw the review about the size, so I ordered the xs. The vest fit my 20lb mini really well around the chest and looked professionall. I would buy the vest again if I needed another one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog  X
customer_reviews.text: I am handicapped, an this harness is very easy for my border collie to just slide her head in without my help. I purchased this one because it looked like the one that would do the best for us. I needed something that would stand me holding on to it as she is walking me at her side. They use the best materials for there products is why they last so long.
customer_reviews.author: pamela wallace

customer_reviews.title: and I love it! I have a 60 lb Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a service vest that was subtle and not so noticeable. I wanted either black or gray but couldn't find it. I came across this one, and I love it! I have a 60 lb Shepherd, and a large fit him very well! I loves that the chest strap was adjustable and you were able to remove the excess strap that was left over! I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S

customer_reviews.title: Item nit as described  or photographed
customer_reviews.text: The harness did not look like the photo. Yhe velcro caught my dogs fur and the strap was around his neck not chest.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: OK but
customer_reviews.text: Even though the vest and all is good but as may before mentioned the front strap is way too bit for the size.
customer_reviews.author: JANA

customer_reviews.title: not very comfortable for a dog to wear
customer_reviews.text: The bottom strap is not padded, not very comfortable for a dog to wear. We prefer the kong brand and now use that one.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Minietta

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this and everything about it. Not too big and hot for my puggle and it's really nice with the leash length.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the Service Dog Vest, Patches, and Collar. My Service Dog is a strong animal, and new to wearing a vest. However, with the quality of the vest & leash, I have been able to maintain total control of her when I have had to redirect her. In fact, I don't think my dog ever wants me to take it off her. Not only can I now have my service dog anywhere I need to go, but she also looks very professional as well. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Warner Jr

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good workmanship!
customer_reviews.text: My dog wants to put it on just to go into the back yard to use the bathroon. It has had an calming effect on him, making much eaiser to work with him. He wants to wear it all the time and not take it off. All postive no negetaive about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Iceman

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace one previously ordered that I didn’t care for and I LOVE this one! It will last forever!
customer_reviews.author: L POLK

customer_reviews.title: ... vest I have ordered from this seller and I love them, they make perfect training vests and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second vest I have ordered from this seller and I love them, they make perfect training vests and the bonus leash is great to keep in your glove compartment as a back up in case you forget the vest at home and still need your Service Dog with you in public.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size chart inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time. Pretty good quality except the leash is somewhat thin. Overall it looks nice but the size chart is inaccurate. My dog is a 55lb female pit with a chest measurement of 32 inches. I ordered a large which is way too big. Then I ordered a medium which is way too tight. I would not buy again just because of the fit is not right
customer_reviews.author: Laurie W.

customer_reviews.title: Just barely
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1yr old pitbull in training, although he's rather solid this harness was a tad too big for him. The material is thick and so far very durable, he seems to be very comfortable will in this and doesn't try to slip out of it. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ReRe8788

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality and fit. Don’t think I’d trust this harness to work as an actual harness.
customer_reviews.author: CampVanLife

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This looks and feels like a good quality harness. I bought it for my puppy in training and figured I'd purchase a larger size when she is full grown, but I am pleasantly surprised and may not have to as this harness allows for a good amount of growth. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Aylaleilani McRae-Hedding

customer_reviews.title: Durable, but not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, very great product. I was expecting it to be more sturdy on my pup, but it slides around on her a lot (yes, yes it is appropriately tightened). Also, I feel like the strap that goes around the chest sinks into her “armpit” and causes her to be like “okay, mom this is annoying”. I do love how durable it is, the color, and the quality. I think it is definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: The body harness and the whole set is quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small Yorkie and the Xsmall fits her perfect. She weighs 7 pounds. I love the colors and the comfortable cushioning the brace has for comfort. Very unique and comfortable design
customer_reviews.author: Kanelizard

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: The small was still too big for I had to adjust it but it was done and if it's a well now
customer_reviews.author: Fran McGee

customer_reviews.title: Dog Service Vest
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, fits my dog perfectly. She is an XL size (Alaskan Malamute). Great fast service too. THANK YOU :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I feel the design could do without the handle especially the smaller sizes.... Well constructed and shipped promptly!
customer_reviews.author: FreidaG

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the XXS for a 9 lb. chihuahua. Fits very well!
customer_reviews.author: D Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it because my dog would get out of it. I don't think it was made right.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Levin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what we needed for our service dog. It's a plus that the patches and lease come with it.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Like the quality
customer_reviews.text: When I measured my dog, he was between sizes. I ordered the smaller. Glad I did. Fits great. The front reflective strip is way big. Will have to cut it down to size. Other than that, product was everything as described.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I like this so much because it is SUPER easy to put on and take off!
customer_reviews.author: mroszhart

customer_reviews.title: The XS is perfect for my min schnauzer who is 23 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It’s well made. It’s not heavy and my dog is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Marie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but too big for my dog
customer_reviews.text: This is a good item but the one I got for my dog is way too big for her so I cannot even use it
customer_reviews.author: tina thornton

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: High quality product has lasted two years. My Hearing Ear dog wears a XXS.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but not a perfect fit for my dog
customer_reviews.text: It’s still a lil big for my 11 lb dog. Great quality, the leash is a little too short, and the vest I uncomfortable for her to walk in. It rubs under her armpits.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Ries

customer_reviews.title: This one is nice and sturdy fit my large blue heeled/lab mix service ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a black one similar but company purchased from was no longer available to buy from. This one is nice and sturdy fit my large blue heeled/lab mix service dog perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MDT

customer_reviews.title: Hot pink SD vest
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and color is definitely hot pink! And I love it.... fits beautifully on our Dane!
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: My happy dog!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this! I didn't want my Shepherd to have a whole body vest with the heat in So. California. This vest is just enough to let people know what she is and not hinder her movements. When i grab it she gets excited and runs in circles at the door, waiting for her command. This seems to be made out of quality materials and i expect it to last quite awhile. Other than her loose hairs getting stuck in velcro and inside of vest, (shedding time) i have no compliants!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY well made product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made vest. After fitting it I had no fear allowing this vest to serve as my girls harness. She's almost 70lbs. The velcro strap across the front is a bit trying it's like it was made going the wrong direction. But once fitted you don't have to mess with it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime L. Booher

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This harness is study and seems to give my support buddy an added calm when worn.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My dog tends to seat a lot with this harness but he seems to be comfortable with the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I love it how it looks but my 13# dog didn’t like it.
customer_reviews.author: NUSRETA BOWSER

customer_reviews.title: Great vest!
customer_reviews.text: No that sturdy. However, great vest! Got dirty really fast. Just washed it and stains came out of vest not leash.
customer_reviews.author: Anisha

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This product is well worth the cost. Comes with many special features, ever a padded hand grip on the list.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S. Hamner

customer_reviews.title: The name of the company has puppy in it and my color comes for a large dog
customer_reviews.text: The quality is excellent but your advertisement miss leading plainly says from extra extra small to large on it come it was extra large no adjustment.And your company name you mentioned puppy quite often very misleading I was assuming it was for small dogs
customer_reviews.author: Danny laycock

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is perfect. It fits our 6 month old 25 pound Bassett for now and she doesn't have a problem wearing it. I'm assuming it's comfortable for her. The handle is really soft and it's easy to control the direction of her walking. The patch that says 'security dog' is actually Velcro and I didn't know this. You can't visually tell but it's pretty cool that we can change the patch if needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The harness is heavy duty and clunky for a littler ...
customer_reviews.text: The harness is heavy duty and clunky for a littler dog. The stitching was out on one full side of Velcro because it wasn't back stitched. I needed it for unexpected flight home from road trip.
customer_reviews.author: funk8ee

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality just needs neck to chest connector for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for my pup except I did not care for the positioning of the front chest strap. I will have to find something to make it more supportive. But is nice all in all
customer_reviews.author: Lladygee

customer_reviews.title: but that was easily fixed by cutting off some-of the Velcro
customer_reviews.text: I found it was a tiny big for my dog around her neck, but that was easily fixed by cutting off some-of the Velcro.It does run a bit large but other then that she is very comfortable in it and it is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, great material. It's the second one we buy in a long time. Patches can be easily removed if it isn't for a service dog. Its comfortable enough to not hurt your pet. There was a problem with delivery and arrived later than expected, that's why I removed a star, but the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Prevents pulling
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this My dog loves it. Wasnt able to walk him before i got this. It fits perfect and he cant get out of it and prevents pulling.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Fits and Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very adjustable, the quality seems good, nice rich color, easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Persinette

customer_reviews.title: Run extremely too large
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality but extremely too large. I had to order an xs after the medium didn't fit my 15lb dachshund. Also, the buckle is way too large for her size.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: I can now take my dog anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my male Terrier. It fits ok. Sometimes it does go to the side but i think its becauae i dont tighten it enough. The only reason for that is I dont want to hurt my boy. Its very nicely made and I love the red. I can now take my dog anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Durable long leash
customer_reviews.text: Adjusts to fit my dog. Super cute but wish it was longer across her back .
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, but a little heavy for my 5 pound dog. Wish it came in a smaller size, but I got the smallest one they made and it was still a little big. All in all a very well made product, and very easy to put on the dog.
customer_reviews.author: kmr

customer_reviews.title: well made harness
customer_reviews.text: fits well, is sturdy. clearly states the animal is in service and not a pet. the animal likes it - i swear she knows this one means business vs her other harness which is not so structured.
customer_reviews.author: Live Aloha

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest. Very nice material and the leash is awesome. The size is more accurate. Fits my 69lb Labrador perfect
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT product from a wonderful company
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful vest! If I could change one thing it would be a clear pocket to install my dog's credentials. But it's quite sturdy and the "service dog" tags are extra heavy duty. Customer service is first rate. Shipping time was super fast!
customer_reviews.author: maryemanley

customer_reviews.title: bad fit. has to be sent back
customer_reviews.text: bad fit. has to be sent back. There are no sizes for small service dog. The leash is the best thing.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: at least a few months very good quality the leash is a big plus also
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small for my American Eskimo pup..she is 10 weeks old. The small will for her for a while...at least a few months very good quality the leash is a big plus also...I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Industrial Puppy Service Dog Vest with Hook and Loop Straps & Matching Service Dog Leash Set - Harnesses from XXS to XXL - Service Dog Harness Features Reflective Patch and Comfortable Mesh Design
feature_bullets: Made from the strongest materials on the market. No more frayed tags or accessories that won't hold - great for large and small breeds
Removable patches mean you need only 1 lightweight, certified harness for everything from grocery shopping to doctor visits. Suitable for all breeds such as Chihuahuas, Poodles, German Shepherds etc.
The only premium service animal vests that accommodate supplies such as saddle bags & backpacks (sold separately), supplying pockets for food, bowls, medications, or extra gear for working dogs
The easy-to-use belly buckle makes suiting up fast — Convenient apparel for on-the-go assistance service, therapy, in training, and emotional support K9 of any breed
Each harness set comes with authentic matching Service Dog Leash – padded, neoprene handle for handler’s comfort & reflective silk-screen Service Dog lettering for safety and identification.
